channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report X-2023090399
item.description:
Report X-2023090399

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-01
  • City: CADILLAC
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DRIVER FOUND PACKAGE LEAKING WHILE DELIVERING AROUND 5:30PM. DRIVER CALLED THE STATION AND THAN THE DRIVER PUT THE PACKAGE IN 2 LAYERS OF PLASTIC BAGS. THE DRIVER CAME BACK TO THE STATION ABOUT 7:30PM. THE PACKAGE WAS REMOVED FROM THE VAN AND IMMEDIATLY PUT INTO A HAZMAT SALVAGE DRUM THAT QA HAD WAITING. DescribePack: UPON PROCESSING THE DAMAGE THE PACKAGE WAS WET AND TORN ON 1 SIDE. 3 1-GALLON PLSTIC JUGS HAD LOOSE CAPS AND WERE LEAKING. ABOUT 1 GALLON OF LIQUID HAD LEAKED OUT. THE 4TH BOTTLE WAS DAMAGED BY THE LEAKING LIQUID (SOILED THE BOTTLE) DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: THE DAMAGE PACKAGE WAS REMOVED FROM THE VAN AS SOON AS IT DOCKED AND PUT INTO A PRE-PREPARED SALVAGE DRUM. 7:30PM 9/1. THE PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED AROUND 1PM ON 9/2

item.title: Report X-2023090493
item.description:
Report X-2023090493

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-03T15:13:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-29
  • City: OAK PARK
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was placed in a bin in the hazmat cage. DescribePack: Contents is Rapicide PA. Each jug had a deliberately made hole in the cap. 1 out of 4 jugs had its inner cap seal punctured and is now leaking because of the already made hole in the cap. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a bin in the hazmat cage.

item.title: Report E-2023090759
item.description:
Report E-2023090759

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-28
  • City: ROMULUS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted and that one of the metal 55 gallon drums of OMCTS (un1993) had been damaged by a sharp object and had released 1 pint of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, co no contractors were dispatched.

item.title: Report X-2023090348
item.description:
Report X-2023090348

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-31
  • City: OAK PARK
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found outside of hazmat cage during outbound. DescribePack: 1 out of 4 glass jugs of methanol HPLC had a loose cap and leaked. 1 out of 4 is crushed and completely leaked out. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Package was brought into the hazmat cage to be worked.

item.title: Report X-2023090316
item.description:
Report X-2023090316

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-31
  • City: SALINE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023090316 SequenceEvent: Package contains one lead-acid battery packed in an open plastic bag inside of the box. Sulfuric acid inside of battery has leaked out and soaked through outer packaging. The package was taken to QA for inspection when damage was discovered. DescribePack: Spillable battery, no apparent damage DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was taken to QA for inspection when damage was discovered. 2. X-2023090319 SequenceEvent: Package contains one lead-acid battery packed into an open plastic bag inside of a box. Sulfuric acid from the battery has leaked out and soaked into the outer packaging. The package was taken to QA for inspection when damage was discovered. DescribePack: spillable battery, no visible damage DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was taken to QA for inspection when damage was discovered.

item.title: Report X-2023090308
item.description:
Report X-2023090308

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-30
  • City: PORTAGE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package discovered by PH with droplets around cap + chem odor. Package was removed from area, placed in a HazMat tote, and taken to HazMat cage using proper PPE, where it was discovered that cap failed to operate, resulting in small amount of liquid spilling out. DescribePack: Loose cap, small liquid leak DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was removed from area, placed in a HazMat tote, and taken to HazMat cage using proper PPE.

item.title: Report X-2023090290
item.description:
Report X-2023090290

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-30
  • City: GRAND RAPIDS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: LEAKING HAZMAT BUCKET WAS FOUND DURING UNLOADING PROCESS, PUT IN A HAZMAT TOTE AND BROUGHT OVER FOR INSPECTION. UPON INSPECTION IT WAS FOUND TO BE A DAMAGED HAZMAT AND THE HAZMAT PROCESS WAS STARTED DescribePack: BUCKET WAS FOUND TO HAVE A DENT NEAR THE LID CAUSING THE LID TO POP ALLOWING THE PRODUCT TO SPILL OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PRODUCT WAS TURNED RIGHT SIDE UP.
